title: On linearization of superon-graviton model(SGM)
abstract: Refering to the supermultiplet of the supergravity(SUGRA) the linearization of SGM action describing the nonlinear supersymmetric(NL SUSY) gravitational interaction of superon(Nambu-Goldstone(N-G) fermion) is attempted. The field contents of on-shell SUGRA supermultiplet are realized as the composites, though they have new SUSY transformations which closes on super-Poincar\'e algebra. Particular attentions are paid to the local Lorentz invariance.
